com.metsci.glimpse.painter.info

Class TooltipPainter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metsci.glimpse.painter.base.GlimpsePainterBase
      • com.metsci.glimpse.painter.info.SimpleTextPainter
        • com.metsci.glimpse.painter.info.TooltipPainter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GlimpsePainter

    public class TooltipPainter
extends SimpleTextPainter
    Displays tool tip text at a specified position.
    Author:
    ulman
